code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import'./SignupScreen.css';import{auth}from'../firebase';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SignUpScreen(){var emailRef=useRef(null);var passwordRef=useRef(null);var register=function register(e){e.preventDefault();auth.createUserWithEmailAndPassword(emailRef.current.value,passwordRef.current.value).then(function(authUser){console.log(authUser);}).catch(function(error){alert(error.message);});};var signIn=function signIn(e){e.preventDefault();auth.signInWithEmailAndPassword(emailRef.current.value,passwordRef.current.value).then(function(authUser){console.log(authUser);}).catch(function(error){alert(error.message);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"signupScreen",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:" Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:emailRef,type:"Email",placeholder:"Enter your email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:passwordRef,type:"Password",placeholder:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:signIn,type:"submit",children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"signupScreen__gray",children:"New to Neflix?
